complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Set Up Real-Time Infrastructure with Phoenix Channels and PubSub
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break this task into subtasks covering Phoenix Channels integration, PubSub configuration with Redis/PostgreSQL, channel creation for presence and feeds, and comprehensive load testing for scalability.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to real-time requirements, horizontal scalability needs, and rigorous load testing simulating high concurrency, involving multiple backend integrations and performance optimizations.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Global and Subject-Specific Presence Indicators
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into subtasks for extending PresenceChannel, implementing anonymized tracking and opt-out logic, and ensuring compliance with privacy regulations.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate to high complexity from extending real-time features, handling anonymization and opt-out functionality, plus compliance with COPPA/FERPA, requiring careful data handling and testing.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split into subtasks for setting up the ActivityFeed module with event listening and broadcasting, and implementing anonymization with opt-out checks.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium complexity involving real-time broadcasting and database storage with anonymization, but straightforward given the dependency on Task 1, with focus on performance and privacy.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into subtasks for creating the LeaderboardService with database queries and caching, and integrating real-time updates via Channels.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium complexity due to query optimization, caching for performance, and real-time integration, with dependencies on Task 1 making it manageable but requiring UI and backend coordination.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into subtasks for UI integration of nudges in practice sessions and backend tracking of invites and conversions.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Lower medium complexity as it involves UI changes and link generation, dependent on presence features, with testing focused on user experience rather than heavy technical challenges.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split into subtasks for micro-deck generation, deep link creation and sharing, and reward tracking upon completion.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity from viral loop mechanics, deep link handling, and attribution tracking, building on dependencies with integration of analytics and rewards.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into subtasks for percentile rank calculation, leaderboard creation with deep links, and ensuring real-time updates.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving leaderboard logic, deep links, and real-time features, with dependencies on Task 1 and 4, requiring careful testing for shareability and participation.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into subtasks for weekly reel generation and visualization, email automation, and attribution tracking with privacy compliance.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to visual content creation, email integration, and strict privacy requirements, with no dependencies but needing robust testing for compliance and delivery.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split into subtasks for streak monitoring and prompt triggering, and co-practice link generation with reward issuance.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium complexity from monitoring logic and prompt timing, dependent on Tasks 1 and 6, with focus on user retention metrics and automated testing.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Integrate Session Intelligence and Agentic Actions
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into subtasks for AI transcription and summarization setup, action triggering based on summaries, and implementing explainability and fallbacks.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Very high complexity due to AI integration, real-time analysis, and agentic actions, with multiple dependencies and extensive testing for accuracy, latency, and reliability.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into subtasks for event schema and tracking implementation, signed link attribution, ExperimentationAgent for A/B tests, and dashboard creation with cohort analysis.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity from comprehensive analytics setup, experimentation, and real-time monitoring, heavily dependent on prior tasks, requiring data validation and simulation testing.
